content: Hello! I'm Film Buff, your movies and TV shows assistant. How can I help you today?
What movies are trending this week?

Here are some of the trending movies this week:
1. [A Minecraft Movie]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/950387)]: Four misfits find themselves struggling with ordinary problems when they are suddenly pulled through a mysterious portal into the Overworld.
2. [Black Bag]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/1233575)]: When an intelligence agent is suspected of betraying the nation, her husband faces the ultimate test of loyalty.
3. [A Working Man]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/1197306)]: Levon Cade, a former military black ops, embarks on a search to bring his boss's daughter home from human traffickers.
4. [Holland]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/257094)]: Nancy, a teacher in Holland, Michigan, becomes suspicious of a secret that tumbles her life into a twisted tale.
5. [Snow White]([TMDb](https://www.themoviedb.org/movie/447273)]: Princess Snow White flees the castle and teams up with seven magical dwarves and a young thief to survive the Evil Queen's pursuit and take back the kingdom. (response from cache)
